summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6193 for the improvement of East 88th Street from 35th Avenue Northeast to 45th Avenue Northeast; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87641, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
